name: TXD's Amazing Adventure 2D!
description:
Welcome To TXD's Amazing Adventure 2D Game! This Weird 2D Game Is A Demo. Theres One Problem Is You Can Jump Multiple Times :( Sorry If This Game Is A Demo.

Story: Alex Got Jailed By A Mean Jacket. And Hes From Creepyface!!! TXD Is Going To Save Alex. The Only Thing He Can Pass Is Beat All Levels! Like The Forest, The Cave, The Beach, The Mansion And Other... GOOD LUCK!

Musics:

Forest Music: Cora Son 19 -Llama

Cave Music: KHK Fustal

Beach Music: SMmusic

Mansion Music: Music From AM X But Weirder

Jacket's Castle Music: Ambient, Boss Music: Jacket's Music V3

End Music: Tesla-Jingle
